label: 宝勝如来
本: Jewel in the Ashes: Buddha Relics and Power in Early Medieval Japan . Harvard University Asia Center . 2000
説明文: Hōshō (Nyorai) (J.)　宝勝（如来）. One of the 5 Thus-Come ones venerated in the rite to feed hungry ghosts (施餓鬼法 segaki-hō) in Shingon, and seen as being identical with 宝生 Hōshō.
